# The `TypeSwitch` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class implements a switch-like dispatch statement for a value of &#39;T&#39; using dyn&#95;cast functionality. <a href="#details">More...</a>

class llvm::TypeSwitch&lt;T, ResultT&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class implements a switch-like dispatch statement for a value of &#39;T&#39; using dyn&#95;cast functionality.

Each <code>Case&lt;T&gt;</code> takes a callable to be invoked if the root value isa&lt;T&gt;, the callable is invoked with the result of <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;T&gt;()</a> as a parameter.

Example: Operation &#42;op = ...; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/logicalresult">LogicalResult</a> result = TypeSwitch&lt;Operation &#42;, LogicalResult&gt;(op) .Case&lt;ConstantOp&gt;(&#91;&#93;(ConstantOp op) &#123; ... &#125;) .Default(&#91;&#93;(Operation &#42;op) &#123; ... &#125;);

Definition at line 87 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/typeswitch-h">TypeSwitch.h</a>.
